__e: Who says that you get to decide what's right and what's wrong... and who gets sacrificed for the greater good and who doesn't?
You say that to me now because you're angry at me, but think who we are talking about, what you have done for him, the things you've sacrificed.
How can you do this to me, after everything that I've done for this family, after everything that I've sacrificed for her?
So do not punish a woman who sacrificed her life to take care of her father... a father who determined the course of his family's destiny for far too long.
My husband sacrificed his life for the job, and... the way he died, I...
Your honor, this woman's husband sacrificed his life In service to our country.
Ma, the point is you sacrificed your whole life for us, all right?
But you gave up your one chance at freedom, all for a child you'd never met.
I think that you sacrificed your own happiness for years to keep your family together, and you are nothing like our mother.
Your honor, this woman's husband sacrificed his life In service to our country.
My husband sacrificed his life for the job, and... the way he died, I...
I mean, I sacrificed my best friend For a man I was sure I was gonna raise a family with.
I've given up everything for you, Lucienne. If only you knew...
She sacrificed everything for us over and over again, and then we were supposed to be there for her.
"I do not care that in all this time... he hasn't seen a woman to compare with me... that his life has been a desert without me... that he sacrificed everything for me. "
I'm taking all my time and I'm doing this for you, and you go and you betrayed me.
She sacrificed everything for us over and over again, and then we were supposed to be there for her.
"I do not care that in all this time... he hasn't seen a woman to compare with me... that his life has been a desert without me... that he sacrificed everything for me. "
I almost traded your lives to do it.
To all those in the armed forces who sacrificed their young lives in this just and holy war for everlasting peace,
You and I have spent our lives on the job, given it our all.
I have sacrificed my blood, my freedom and my life for you, and not because I wanted the Lexicon or the throne of Athens, but because I wanted your love in return.
As your God sacrificed his... .. so that others may live.
You've sacrificed your body for a cause, which is more than most people do.
He sacrificed everything, his land, his family, eventually his life, everything, to pursue his dream.
My father has sacrificed everything to keep me safe and to help me find the other special people like me before it's too late.
We sacrificed everything, and we did it all for you.
